summary: Run 2 additions integrate seamlessly with Run 1 content. New examples use consistent terminology, voice, and formatting. Rella character thread provides excellent continuity across chapters.

chapters_reviewed.notes: 'Your First Scene: Testing Rella' mini-scenario follows style guide. Outcome tier formatting consistent. Cross-reference to Chapter 8 properly formatted.
'Your First Check as GM' callout provides practical new-GM guidance. 'Common First-Session Scenarios' uses consistent DC ladder formatting. Both additions well-integrated.
'Rella vs. the Dock Thug' combat example demonstrates tick progression clearly. Round-by-round format is scannable. Stakes question application at resolution is excellent teaching moment.
No changes from Run 1. Content remains compliant.
No changes from Run 1. Content remains compliant.
